Created attachment 508305
at least three visible stages of menu opening

When you press the Firefox button, first a shadow for the menu appears, then the button depresses, then the menu is populated. This is all visible to the naked eye and gives the appearance of a stutter or other performance problem in the menu opening. 

This is one of the major new features of Firefox 4 and even on decent hardware, it looks pretty bad. 

The screenshot attached shows the (at least) three stages that I can see when the menu is opening. If you put someone with better reflexes or tools on the screencapture, you might see more.
